document_data.name: Slumgullion
document_data.mainbody:
'''Slumgullion''' was a [[hin]] commoner, displaced by [[The Absolute]], and as a refugee, sought shelter in [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''I used to be able to pay to eat at this tavern. Now look at me - begging for scraps at the back door.''|Slumgullion}}
document_data.Description: Slumgullion was a [[lightfoot halfling]] with a pale complexion, blonde hair, and light brown eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, an army assembled by the [[Cult of the Absolute]] moved from the [[Moonrise Towers]] in [[Chionthar Valley]] to menace the city of [[Baldur's Gate]], displacing countless refugees in the process along the way. Slumgullion fled from the Absolutists and found shelter within the city walls. Slumgullion left behind all of his money and had to beg for food scraps at the back of the [[Elfsong]] tavern in the Lower City, alongside other poor refugees.
